snippet: Yemeni troops seized two strongholds of Al Qaeda in the south after an offensive in which dozens of militant suspects and government troops were killed.
abstract: Yemen reports that its troops seized two Al Qaeda strongholds in the south after an offensive in which dozens of militant suspects and government troops were killed.
lead_paragraph: Yemeni troops seized two strongholds of Al Qaeda in the south after an offensive in which dozens of militant suspects and government troops were killed.

headline.main: Yemen: Military Claims Sweep of 2 Qaeda Strongholds in South
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Military Says It Seized 2 Qaeda Strongholds in South
